Uses of Package
online.game

Packages that use online.game
checkerboard   
goban   
hex   
online.common   
online.game This package contains everything a to support actual games. 
online.search   
tablut   
 

Classes in online.game used by checkerboard
BaseBoard.BoardState
           
BoardProtocol
          this is the visible contract between "board" objects and the general parts of the game system.
cell
          this is the common cell which can be used by all boards.
chip
          this is the base class for "chips" which are objects typically placed on boards.
commonCanvas
          This class extends exCanvas and provides a bunch of services for the individual game's Viewer class.
commonMove
          this class is the basis for representing individual moves in the game.
CommonMoveStack
           
commonPlayer
          this class holds information about players.
Digestable
           
Play2Constants
          a collection of constants appropriate for 2 player games, but not appropriate for games with more players.
replayMode
          replayMode serves as advice to control saving animation information or not
RobotProtocol
          SimpleRobotProtocol plus some extra methods to interface with the search driver is all your robot has to implement to do a complete search.
SimpleRobotProtocol
          this is the interface to start stop and create robot players.
stackCell
          stackCell extends cell with a stack of chips.
ViewerProtocol
          Technically speaking, an add-on game for boardspace only needs to implement ViewerProtocol.
ViewGameProtocol
          these protocol items are normally of concern only to the Game class.
